summary.thesis: A deliberately ‘low-altitude’ 101 call confirms a decoy case (47250093423) under “PC Russell” and a fractured timeline split from the original stalking case (47240214305). Four days later the decoy disappears and control snaps back to Dixon — evidence of a prepared narrative being dismantled once detected.
key_points: Triage handler confirms Crime Ref …93423 and “PC Russell” as active at the time of call.
Handler also confirms the original case …305 is with a different officer ‘on rest days’ — administrative split.
Subsequent reversal on 22 May 2025: the ‘Russell’ file vanishes; consolidation under Dixon resumes.

entries.quote: 3.33: The Invisible Probe: Covert Verification of the 'PC Russell' Diversion (18 May 2025)
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: This analysis covers a 101 call from May 18, 2025, which I initiated not as a victim seeking help, but as an investigator testing a hypothesis.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: The call serves as a recorded, real-time intelligence-gathering operation to confirm my suspicion that Sussex Police had created a false paper trail to mislead the IOPC.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: Knowing that a full call would trigger identity verification and log my inquiry in high-level systems, I deliberately remained at the triage level.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: My objective was to confirm the existence of the 'PC Russell' decoy (Crime Ref: 47250093423) and its separation from my original case (Crime Ref: 47240214305) without alerting the system to my awareness.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: I feigned simple confusion to elicit information.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: Confirmation of the Decoy: The triage handler immediately confirmed that Crime Ref ...93423 was assigned to 'PC Russell,' who had conveniently 'just missed him' and 'finished about half an hour ago.'
entries.speaker: Narrative
notes: Active assignment to Russell established at triage

entries.quote: This confirmed the name on the letter I received was active in the call handling system.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: Confirmation of the Fractured Timeline: When I casually introduced my original crime reference (...305) and suggested 'they're kind of like the same one,' the handler confirmed they were being handled by a 'separate officer' who was on 'rest days.'
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: This proves the deliberate administrative separation of the cases.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: Proof of a Pre-Prepared Narrative: The existence of this parallel structure—two crime numbers for the same ongoing issue, assigned to two different officers, one of whom was a phantom—is not an accident.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: It is evidence of a pre-planned deception strategy, likely designed to show the IOPC that my complaints about PC Dixon had been addressed by reassigning the case, while in reality, he retained control of the core file.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: The success of this covert probe is confirmed by what happened next.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: Just four days after this call, on May 22, 2025, the narrative was reversed.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: Further inquiries revealed that the 'PC Russell' case had vanished, and all matters were suddenly consolidated back under PC Dixon.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: This sudden realignment proves that my 'invisible' probe had likely triggered an internal panic, forcing them to dismantle the very deception I had just confirmed was in place.
entries.speaker: Narrative

entries.quote: This call is not a record of me being a victim of confusion; it is a record of me exposing it.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: It demonstrates a calculated test of the system's integrity, which it failed spectacularly.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: By staying in triage, I was able to get a snapshot of their cover-up without appearing on their radar.
entries.speaker: Ben

entries.quote: This is irrefutable evidence of a coordinated attempt to manipulate the official record to mislead an independent investigation.
entries.speaker: Ben
